name: Still Life 1.0
description: Fizz Pop (b.1974),  Still Life 1.0, 2009,  4200 x 3300 pix      Still Life 1.0 was first exhibited at the 2009 SCOPE Art Fair in New York, through RARE Gallery, released as a limited edition cibachrome print.  This began a project exploring contemporary Still Life painting through the digital medium.  The first paintings in this series interpreted Dutch Golden Age masterpieces; the source for this piece being Jan Davidsz de Heem, Vase of Flowers, 1660, oil on canvas, 69.6cm x 56.5 cm.
